sourceimage.paragraphone: The Rental Van Company of East Charlotte is a proud company. We are a company that rents vans out to people who need them. These vans are able to take on multiple rolls to complete different task. Our vans are meant for everyday work, with each van having somesort of customization done to it to fit that general need. So if you need one to do construction out of, we have vans with built in shelving and 12v outlets. One for moving, there are long and tall vans to cram all your stuff in so you don't have to make 2 trips. Need extra seating for family vacation, we have a vans with seating of up to 15 people.
sourceimage.paragraphtwo: Now, go look at our vans that we have to offer. You can do this by clicking on the Rentals.
